PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

• Extensive experience in designing test cases, test execution, review, and analysis, report the outcome.

manual testing.

• Having good knowledge of object-oriented programming concepts, MBT (model-based testing), web automation and 
manual testing. 
• Good experience in TV video streaming application testing.

Life Cycle (STLC) and Defect Management Life Cycle Methodologies. 
• Worked in IT Domain projects relevant to  “Master Data Management ”and  “Employee support. ”

test case, test execution, defect tracking.

test case, test execution, defect tracking.

Company 1: VIZIO

.

development.

Testing streaming applications in VIZIO smart TVs. 
 
 
 
Company 2: Model N, Inc 
Role: SQAE 2

Testing streaming applications in VIZIO smart TVs. 
 
 
 
Company 2: Model N, Inc 
Role: SQAE 2 
Project: Flex Government Pricing 
Duration: July 2020 to October 2023 
Location: Hyderabad, India 
Project Description: 
Government Pricing enables you to quickly and efficiently monitor and comply with all government-mandated pricing and 
reporting requirements. The requirements include those established by the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program, the Federal 
Supply Schedule, and the Veteran’s Health Care Act of 1992. You can reproduce the method used to arrive at any pricing 
calculation at any point in time, so you can respond to audit inquiries instantly and effortlessly. 
 
Responsibilities : 
 
• Collaboratively work with team to resolve Backlog issues in Government Pricing team. 
• Designed and implemented the automation testing framework for use in validating new and existing component 
releases using Selenium WebDriver

• Designed and implemented the automation testing framework for use in validating new and existing component 
releases using Selenium WebDriver 
• Running regression suite for each sprint just to make sure current code fix doesn’t break old functionalities. 
• Giving value adds/generic code enhancements to existing framework. 
• Followed Agile methodology. 
• Worked as scrum master for quarterly releases. 
• Model N Government Pricing (GxP) is designed to reflect the workflow steps you are likely to take when managing. 
• product pricing. Model N Government Pricing (GxP) includes the following: 
• Scrub and feed is a standard interface mechanism for the acquisition and validation of incoming 
• transactional data. 
• Pricing manager is a window into the pricing process that can show pricing metrics and statuses in an 
• easy-to-use manner. The pricing manager allows you to: 
• easily manage pricing status and versioning 
• access the calculation details supporting each price.

• easy-to-use manner. The pricing manager allows you to: 
• easily manage pricing status and versioning 
• access the calculation details supporting each price. 
• access transactional drill-through functionality for research and exclusion of records. 
• Metric builder is designed to support the configuration of pricing calculations within Model N Government 
• Pricing. The metric builder supports typical weighted-average pricing formulas, such as AMP, ASP, and 
• NFAMP, and net price calculations, such as Best Price.

• Model N Government Pricing. The metric builder supports a typical weighted average.

.

Java and API Usage: 
To develop the keyword driven framework we have used Reflections Concepts, Collections, Regular Expressions, Report 
related concepts. 
Following are the capabilities of hierarchy management platform: 
• Able to classify, create and manage hierarchies and their relationships with various business groups or entities. 
• Able to view hierarchies with advanced search features. 
• Able to set up and configure business rules and workflow processes . 
• Able to provide role-based security access .

includes SOAP and RESTFUL.

Company 4: Tech Mahindra                                                                                                                  
Role: Automation Engineer 
Duration: October 2014 to August 2017 
Client Location: Cisco Systems 
Location: Hyderabad, India 
 
Project-1: HMP (Hierarchy Management Platform) 
Description: Hierarchy Management Platform is a single source of truth for Cisco Enterprise Hierarchies. The initiative is 
focused on publishing the Hierarchy data with governed data model which can be exposed hierarchies as a service and can 
be easily scalable to integrate new hierarchies.

focused on publishing the Hierarchy data with governed data model which can be exposed hierarchies as a service and can 
be easily scalable to integrate new hierarchies.  
• The primary Goal of the Hierarchy Management platform is to enable growth of Cisco’s new business models by 
providing the enterprise wise simplified hierarchy classification between various business entities. 
• Develop and implement an automation strategy for the HMP to improve operational efficiency. 
• Integrate HMP with external systems and third-party tools using APIs to extend functionality. 
• Build custom tools or applications to enhance the capabilities of the HMP. 
• Automate device provisioning and decommissioning processes within the HMP. 
• Document automation workflows, scripts, and processes for reference and troubleshooting. 
• Develop test cases and validation procedures to ensure the accuracy and reliability of automation workflows.

• Develop test cases and validation procedures to ensure the accuracy and reliability of automation workflows. 
• Implement backup and recovery automation to ensure network resilience in case of failures. 
 
WebDriver Usage:

We have automated the regression suits with selenium and follows the same with progression cases. We are currently 
using keyword driven framework in the project. The main agenda of using this framework is that, in the application we 
create test data which has to be generic all the time so for every run we generate new data. When it comes to key word 
driven we put the executable methods in an excel sheet and according to the attributes in the method we give the 
respective xpath’s relating to the attributes in the sheet. So when we execute the testcase it randomly goes to the excel and 
chooses the method and executes the test cases in a stepwise manner. 
I have been using selenium web driver for the last 3 + years, we regularly do automation for regression scope. Our team 
designed a framework which is feasible for conformiq users and also non conformiq users. Earlier we used to support web 
services to downstream subscribers, so I worked on web services as well.

designed a framework which is feasible for conformiq users and also non conformiq users. Earlier we used to support web 
services to downstream subscribers, so I worked on web services as well.
